EmailTemplate.name: DYK Video: Activity Reporting- China
EmailTemplate.subject: Ipreo- Did You Know? New Video Edition available on youku!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did You Know? Measure Your Meeting Effectiveness!
Have you ever thought about how best to measure the effectiveness of your meetings, or your ROI on time spent with investors?
Did you know in BD Corporate you can easily generate reports that tie changes in ownership to the touchpoints you’ve had with institutional investors. Watch this quick video on YouKu to learn more!
For further information or training, please contact your dedicated Account Manager or 24/7 client support at: callmenowIR@ipreo.com or the telephone numbers below:
US: 1-800-305-0819 | Europe: +44 (0) 20 7665 9820 | APAC: +852 58082616
